channel.title: Timeline of the City's History: 1877 on Homicide in Chicago 1870-1930
channel.description: Recent content in Timeline of the City's History: 1877 on Homicide in Chicago 1870-1930

item.title: The Old Crib When the Lake Was Frozen Over
item.description: This picture shows the old Crib at a time when the Lake was frozen over so that even a sleigh could drive safely. Winters like that are now rare. Courtesy of “Chicago and Its Makers” (Chicago: Felix Mendelsohn, 1929). Other images from this year
